name: Medical Care and Specialty Care (Non-Urgent)
description: The Tom Waddell Urban Health Clinic serves adults experiencing homelessness and supportive housing residents of the Tenderloin community by providing the following services: - Primary Care - Comprehensive HIV prevention and care - Hepatitis C treatment - Office based opioid treatment - Transgender care - Integrated behavioral health services - Podiatry and dental services How to Apply: - To make an appointment, call (628) 754-7800 Open Hours: - Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Friday: 8AM to 5PM
fullDescription: The Tom Waddell Urban Health Clinic serves adults experiencing homelessness and supportive housing residents of the Tenderloin community by providing the following services: - Primary Care - Comprehensive HIV prevention and care - Hepatitis C treatment - Office based opioid treatment - Transgender care - Integrated behavioral health services - Podiatry and dental services How to Apply: - To make an appointment, call (628) 754-7800 Open Hours: - Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Friday: 8AM to 5PM

howToGetIt: Call main line to make an appointment.
address: 230 Golden Gate Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94102
